name: Dead In Time
description: "Dead in time" is a hardcore action with a non-trivial level generation system and the ability to control time. Each enemy that you meet on your way, is deadly and unique in its own way.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i3 - i5, 2.3-2.5 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek ALC8800 or equivalent Additional Notes: "Dead in time" is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development. Gamepad support for XInput devices.
